name: Hungry Fish (A_Random_Function)
description: Hungry Fish is a game made for the Brackeys game jam 2021.1. In Hungry fish you play as a fish with a massive appetite and in order to survive you need to eat other, bigger fish. You are unable to eat bigger fish by yourself however and need to find friendly fish to help you eat others. If you get too hungry you will eat one of your friendly fish. In the "How to fish" menu you can see how many follower-fish you need to successfully eat the bigger fish. You also get points for eating other fish and the number of friendly fish following you works as a score multiplier.  And finally you can change the difficulty (increase or decrease the friendly fish spawn rate) in the game over menu.
